metadata.document_version: Midnite Solar Classic MODBUS Register Map Rev C.4 – Dec 9 2013
metadata.endianness: 16‑bit registers, bits numbered LSB‑0 (little‑endian). Use [addr]MSB and [addr]LSB as shown in the spec.
metadata.32bit_combination: (high << 16) + low   // high‑word register first, low‑word second in the PDF
metadata.string_registers: 4210‑4213 – four consecutive 16‑bit words hold an ASCII name (8 chars, LSB‑first).
metadata.eeprom_write: (EE) means the value is stored to EEPROM only after a write to register 4161 bit 2 (ForceEEpromUpdateWriteF).

registers.name: UNIT_ID
registers.description: Hardware revision and voltage category of the Classic.

registers.name: RESTART_TIME_MS
registers.description: Countdown until the Classic can wake up.

registers.name: COMBO_CHARGE_STAGE
registers.description: High byte = charge stage, low byte = internal state (see tables 4120‑1 & 4120‑2).

registers.name: HIGHEST_VINPUT_LOG
registers.description: Highest PV input voltage ever seen (saved in EEPROM).

registers.name: MATCH_POINT_SHADOW
registers.description: Current wind‑power curve step being indexed (1‑16).

registers.name: LIFETIME_KWH_HI
registers.description: High word of the lifetime kWh register.

bits.description: Low word of the 32‑bit INFO_FLAGS (see also register 4131).

bits.name: NITE_MINUTES_NO_PWR
bits.description: Counts up when no power; resets on power.

bits.name: FLOAT_TIME_TODAY_SEC
bits.description: Seconds spent in Float today (reset at midnight).

bits.name: ABSORB_TIME
bits.description: Absorb‑time counter; counts down to 0 → Float.

bits.name: RESERVED_4140
bits.description: May show Ibatt in older firmware – treat as reserved.

bits.name: PWM_READONLY
bits.description: Duty‑cycle command of PWM (raw count, not %).

bits.name: REASON_FOR_RESET
bits.description: Reason the Classic reset – see table 4142‑1.

bits.name: RESERVED_4144
bits.description: Do NOT write – used for solar‑tracking debug in old firmware.

bits.name: MPP_W_LAST
bits.description: Internal reference (~10 % of last MPP) – overwritten on next sweep.

bits.name: ABSORB_TIME_EEPROM
bits.description: Set‑point time for the battery to stay in Absorb stage.

bits.name: GENERAL_PURPOSE_WORD
bits.description: General purpose word – originally battery type.

bits.name: EQUALIZE_RETRY_DAYS
bits.description: Auto‑EQ retry days before giving up.

bits.name: FORCE_FLAGS_LO
bits.description: Low word of the 32‑bit ForceFlag register (see 4161).

bits.name: FORCE_FLAGS_HI
bits.description: Write‑only command register – set a bit to trigger the associated action.

bits.name: EQUALIZE_TIME_EEPROM
bits.description: Initialize time for batteries to remain in Equalize stage.

bits.name: AUX_1_AND_2_FUNCTION
bits.description: Combined Aux‑1 & Aux‑2 function + on/off – bits 6‑7 = Aux1, bits 14‑15 = Aux2 (see tables 4165‑1/‑2).

bits.name: AUX2_PWM_VWIDTH
bits.description: Voltage range for Aux 2 PWM (0‑5 V).
Write‑only flags that trigger actions; requires a Classic reset for some bits.

bits.name: ARC_FAULT_SENSITIVITY
bits.description: Arc‑fault protection sensitivity. Time = [4183] (low word), Sense = ([4183]>>16) & 0xFF, Mode = ([4183] << 16). Requires Classic reset after change.

bits.name: RESERVED_4184
bits.description: Do NOT write – used for solar‑tracking debug.
Legacy flag register – now duplicated in ENABLE_FLAGS2.

bits.name: SWEEP_INTERVAL_SECS
bits.description: Legacy P&O / Hydro sweep interval; writing forces a sweep.

bits.name: SWEEP_DEPTH
bits.description: Legacy/Hydro sweep depth expressed as a percentage of present MPP.

bits.name: WIND_TABLE_TO_USE
bits.description: Selects which wind‑power curve table is active (future).

bits.desc: MNGP Red LED = current‑limit / FET temp limit
LED 2 – Comm test (flashes on Modbus tx)

bits.name: UNIT_NAME_0
bits.description: First two bytes of an 8‑character ASCII unit name (LSB first).

bits.name: UNIT_NAME_3
bits.description: Fourth word of unit name (pads with 0x00 if <8 chars).

bits.name: CTI_ME0_LO
bits.description: Low‑word of consolidated time register 0 (seconds since epoch).

bits.name: CTI_ME1_LO
bits.description: Low word of consolidated time register 1 (minutes).

bits.name: CTI_ME2
bits.description: Consolidated time register 2 – day‑of‑year (bits 0‑10), month, year (see table 4218‑1).

bits.name: REMOTE_MENU_MODE
bits.description: Remote menu command sent from MNGP.

bits.name: PRE_VOC
bits.description: Input Voc before relay (do not write unless instructed).

bits.name: FOLLOW_ME_PASS_REF
bits.description: Enable Follow‑Me if >0; set to ≥ number of units in the loop.

bits.name: SERIAL_NUMBER_MSB
bits.description: Classic serial number MSB – writing both bytes unlocks Ethernet write access.

bits.name: FOLLOW_ME_PASS_REF
bits.description: Enable Follow‑Me if >0; set to at least number of units in the loop.

bits.name: CLEAR_LOGS_CAT
bits.description: Write 0x8000|cat to start clear; after ≥750 ms write 0x4000|cat. Success = 0x0500, failure = 0x0A00.

bits.name: CLEAR_LOGS_COUNTER_10MS
bits.description: Timer used by the clear‑logs sequence.

bits.name: WJBJ_NUMERATOR_SS_EEPROM
bits.description: Whizbang Jr gain adjustment; default 0, range ±32767.

bits.name: WJBJ_CURRENT_32_SIGNED
bits.description: Scaled & rounded Whizbang Jr current (±3276.7 A).

bits.name: FLAGS_RD_LO
bits.description: Low word of the 32‑bit internal flags (see table 4240‑1).

bits.name: FLAGS_RD_HI
bits.description: High word of the 32‑bit internal flags.

bits.name: ENDING_SOC_EEPROM
bits.description: SOC to end absorb (future SOC use).

bits.name: END_AMP_SOC_ADDRESS
bits.description: Modbus address of Ibatt – future SOC use.

bits.name: REBUCK_VOLTAGE_EEPROM
bits.description: Re‑bulk voltage set point (trigger if Vbatt < this for >90 s).

bits.name: BATT_MON_VOLTAGE
bits.description: Battery monitor voltage – future SOC use.

bits.name: DAYS_BTW_BULK_ABS_EEPROM
bits.description: Days between bulk/absorb cycles; 0 = every day.

bits.name: DAY_LOG_COMB_CAT_INDEX
bits.description: Selects daily‑log category and how many days back to read.

bits.name: LOG_VALUE_READ
bits.description: Requested single logging data point appears here after a file‑read request.

bits.name: MIN_LOG_COMB_CAT_INDEX
bits.description: Selects minute‑log (or hourly/recent) category and index.

bits.name: REBUCK_TIMER_SEC_EEPROM
bits.description: Re‑bulk interval timer; cleared when Vbatt ≥ Re‑bulk voltage in Float MPPT.

bits.name: VOC_QUALIFY_TIMER_MS_LO
bits.description: Qualifying time until turn‑on (not very useful).

bits.name: IPV_MINUS_RAW
bits.description: Raw PV negative current from ADC (1 count = 0.1 A).

bits.name: LOW_WATTS_EEPA
bits.description: Classic rests when watts < this for >90 s (non‑wind).

bits.name: WINDOW_WATTS_RO_DELTA_EEPA
bits.description: Delta watts below WIND_LOW_WATTS that still counts as “wiggling”.

bits.name: WIND_TIMEOUT_REF_EEPA
bits.description: If power < this for the given seconds, Classic goes to Rest.

bits.name: MIN_VPV_TURN_ON
bits.description: Minimum PV voltage required to exit Rest.

bits.name: VPV_B4_TURN_OFF
bits.description: Internal reference of Vpv when going to Rest.

bits.name: HYDRO_SWP_AMPS10_TIME6
bits.description: Internal variable for hydro sweep speed.

bits.name: IFLAGSRO_LOW
bits.description: Low word of Follow‑Me flags (see table 4328‑1).

bits.name: FOLLOW_ME_PASS_REF_EEPROM
bits.description: Enable Follow‑Me if >0 (set to number of units in loop).

bits.name: CLEAR_LOGS_CAT
bits.description: Write 0x8000|cat → start clear; after ≥750 ms write 0x4000|cat. Success = 0x0500.

bits.name: CLEAR_LOGS_COUNTER_10MS
bits.description: Timer for the two‑step clear‑logs command.

bits.name: WJBJ_RAW_CURRENT
bits.description: Raw current from Whizbang Jr A/D (1 count = 0.1 A, signed).

bits.name: WJBJ_CURRENT_32_SIGNED
bits.description: Scaled & rounded Whizbang Jr amps (±3 276.7 A).

AUX1_FUNCTION_BITS.desc: DIVERSION_SLOW_HIGH (non‑PWM on when Vbatt > HiAbs, off when < LoAbs

AUX1_FUNCTION_BITS: value":6,"desc":"PV_ON_HIGH (active high if Vpv > HiPv after delay)

AUX1_FUNCTION_BITS.value\":7,\"desc: PV_OFF_LOW (active low if Vpv < LoPv after delay)

AUX1_FUNCTION_BITS: value":14,"desc":"NITE LIGHT HIGH (on at dawn, off at dusk)
value":15,"desc":"DAY LIGHT HIGH (on at dawn, off at dusk)

AUX1_FUNCTION_BITS.value\":18,\"desc: FLOAT_LOW – off when not float after 2 s

LED_MODE.desc: MNGP Red LED = current‑limit / FET‑temp limit

REASON_FOR_RESET_TABLE.desc: PV rising too slowly – low light
Battery voltage too high above set point
Battery voltage overshoot (small battery / bad cable)
Mode changed while running OR Vabsorb raised >10 V OR Nominal Vbatt changed and MPPT ON

LED_MODE_TABLE.desc: MNGP Red LED = Battery Full (Float) / Aux1 ON / Aux2 ON / Blue unused
